Document.Focus: Cleaning to prevent the spread of germs

QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Cleaning to prevent the spread of germs
QAPair.Answer: Germs from a person may be found on any object the person touched or on equipment that was used during the person's care. Some germs can live many weeks on a dry surface. Germs on any surface can pass to you or another person. Cleaning helps prevent the spread of germs. Your workplace has policies about how to clean: Patient rooms, Spills or contamination, Supplies and equipment that are reusable ,
